---
title: "Medidata Data Dictionary"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r }
library(ironer)
```

Data dictionary of clinical data recorded in medidata. Subject to change.
The data consists of multiple tables.


```{r setup}
library(ironer)
#?dictionary_medidata
```

```{r dictionary-reactable, echo=FALSE}
dictionary_medidata %>% 
   reactable::reactable(
    filterable = TRUE,
    searchable = TRUE,
    resizable = TRUE,
    groupBy = "Table",
    #paginateSubRows = FALSE,
    columns = list(
      Table = reactable::colDef(minWidth = 200)
    )
  )
```
